recordData.Household Remarks: Name on a petition, 5 Mar 1790, to the Governor from citizens of Franklin County complaining that four men of their county met in South Carolina and recommended to the Governor the field officers of t

sourceCitation: Document: Telamon Cuyler Collection, Manuscript #1170 [Hargrett Library, University of Georgia]; Call Number: Box 42, Folder 2; Page Number: 2; Family Number: 7
sourceInformation: Ancestry.com. U.S., Census Reconstructed Records, 1660-1820 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2011. Original data: Census Publishing. State Census Records. West Jordan, Utah: Census Publishing, 2003-2009.
originalData: Census Publishing. State Census Records. West Jordan, Utah: Census Publishing, 2003-2009.
sourceDescription: Records in this database come from Census Publishing’s efforts to both restore or re-create missing pieces of early censuses and actually create decennial “census” records for the years prior to 1790. They extract their information from sources such as not limited to: tax lists, legislative petitions, voter's lists, state and federal land records, and military lists. Learn more...
